Class LdapSearchController

java.lang.Object

      org.esupportail.commons.beans.AbstractApplicationAwareBean
          org.esupportail.commons.web.controllers.LdapSearchController
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, Resettable, org.springframework.beans.factory.InitializingBean
public class LdapSearchController
extends AbstractApplicationAwareBean
implements Resettable

A visual bean used to search LDAP directories.
